# showsProgressPanel

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the print operation displays a progress panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsProgressPanel: Bool { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **flag**: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you want to display a progress panel; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

This method does not affect the display of a print panel; that operation is controlled by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintOperation/showsPrintPanel] method.

Operations that generate EPS or PDF data do no display a progress panel, regardless of the value in the `flag` parameter.

## Modifying the User Interface

- **showsPrintPanel**: A Boolean value that determines whether the print operation displays a print panel.
- **jobTitle**: The custom title of the print job.
- **printPanel**: The print panel object to use during the operation.
- **pdfPanel**: The PDF panel object to use during the operation.
